meanings.sent1: The garganeys swam gracefully in the pond.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of garganeys flying south for the winter.
meanings.sent3: Why did the garganeys bring umbrellas to the pond? For a quack shower!
meanings.sent4: The garganeys moved like synchronized swimmers on the water.
meanings.sent5: The colorful plumage of the garganeys stood out against the green reeds.

meanings.definition: plural form of garganey, referring to multiple ducks of this species
meanings.sent1: Look at all the garganeys swimming together in the lake.
meanings.sent2: The field guide listed garganeys as a common sight in wetlands.
meanings.sent3: The farmer was surprised by the gaggle of garganeys in his pond.
meanings.sent4: The sky was filled with a cloud of garganeys, a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The noisy chatter of the garganeys echoed across the marsh.
